section.title: EMFT Newsgroup
section.p: Elver persistency is moving to Eclipse.org as a subproject in EMFT. Support for Elver/Teneo is given on the EMFT newsgroup: news://news.eclipse.org/eclipse.technology.emft.

section.title: Mailing List
section.p: Support is provided through a mailinglist. You can subscribe to this mailinglist by sending an email to: Subscribe. Unsubscribing is done through the following link: Unsubscribe. The traffic on the mailinglist is probably pretty low.
The mailing list is used for the EMF - JDO as well as the EMF - Hibernate integration.
The mail archive can be viewed here (web) or here (news, nntp).

section.title: How we can help you
section.p: We will do our best to answer your questions as promptly as possible. We can help you in the best way if you include the following information:

ul.li: The log file (see here on where to find it)
The version of Elver Store, Eclipse, EMF, jdk, and database
